thread.title: Coronation Street's Michelle goes BERSERK and throws bottle of champagne through the Rovers Return's window
thread.title_full: Coronation Street's Michelle goes BERSERK and throws bottle of champagne through the Rovers Return's window

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Coronation Street's Michelle goes BERSERK and throws bottle of champagne through the Rovers Return's window
text:
Coronation Street's Michelle goes BERSERK and throws bottle of champagne through the Rovers Return's window Michelle Connor wants a divorce from her husband and will do anything to get it Share Michelle's having a breakdown (Photo: ITV) Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
It all went down in the latest episode of Coronation Street. 
Michelle Connor, played by Kym Marsh, held a lock-in after her husband, Steve, refused to give her the divorce she's asking for. 
Things quickly escalated, and Steve ended up calling the coppers on his wife. 
Sadly for Steve, that didn't solve anything and Michelle just became even angrier. Michelle snapped (Photo: ITV) She started destroying the pub (Photo: ITV) Read More Coronation Street spoiler: Michelle Connor goes berserk and jumps Eva Price in shocking bar brawl 
Even though the pub isn't hers, Michelle realised everything inside it was, and so proceeded to begin destroying it in a bid to get back at her cheating hubby. 
"Fine, I guess I'll just have to destroy it all then," she said before throwing a bottle of champagne through the front window. 
Barely missing people walking past, Michelle could have ended up seriously injuring someone, or worse. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
